Create LD matrix from plink output.

Source: R/LD.R
LD.read_ld_table.Rd

Depending on which parameters you give plink when calculating LD, you get different file outputs. When it produces an LD table, use this function to create a proper LD matrix.

LD.read_ld_table(ld.path, snp.subset = F, fillNA = 0, verbose = T)

See also

Other LD: LD.1KG_download_vcf(), LD.1KG(), LD.LD_blocks(), LD.UKBiobank(), LD.calculate_LD(), LD.dprime_table(), LD.filter_vcf_gaston(), LD.filter_vcf(), LD.get_vcf_folder(), LD.leadSNP_block(), LD.load_or_create(), LD.plink_LD(), LD.plink_file(), LD.plot(), LD.read_bin(), LD.run_plink_LD(), LD.translate_population(), LD.vcf_to_bed()
